revised_title: Optical Hysteresis for TE Guided Modes in Nonlinear Dielectric Films
tldr: The authors investigate the hysteresis properties of TE guided modes in optically linear dielectric films embedded in dissimilar optically nonlinear unbounded media. They demonstrate that many important features can be determined without knowing the electric fields in the nonlinear media and show that asymmetric modes occur both in linear and nonlinear structures. The study also explores the possibility of optical hysteresis and bistability in these structures.
